member.summary: Represents a node in the B-tree data structure Internal nodes store keys and child references Leaf nodes store keys and values

member.summary: Gets the keys stored in this node (always sorted)

member.summary: Gets the values stored in this node (for leaf nodes) For non-unique indexes, each key can have multiple values

member.summary: Gets the child node references (for internal nodes)

member.summary: Gets whether this node is a leaf node

member.name: P:AdvGenNoSqlServer.Storage.Indexing.BTreeNode`2.NextLeaf
member.summary: Gets the next leaf node (for efficient range scans, only valid for leaf nodes)

member.summary: Gets the parent node (null for root)

member.summary: Gets the number of keys in this node

member.summary: Gets whether this node is full (has 2t-1 keys where t is minimum degree)

member.summary: Gets whether this node has the minimum number of keys (t-1)
